parameter.name: contour_max_level
parameter.documentation: Highest level for contours to be drawn
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_max_level sent to new Magics[LevelSelection].

parameter.name: contour_min_level
parameter.documentation: Lowest level for contours to be drawn
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_min_level sent to new Magics[LevelSelection].

parameter.name: contour_shade_max_level
parameter.documentation: Highest level for contours to be shaded

parameter.name: contour_shade_min_level
parameter.documentation: Lowest level for contours to be shaded
